short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically switch the opened tabs every 20 seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically switch tabs. Click the extension icon to enable it. Click the extension icon again to disable it.
